dublin_core.dcvalue: To evaluate an integrated telehealth intervention Integrated Telehealth Education and Activation of Mood I TEAM to improve chronic illness congestive heart failure chronic obstructive pulmonary disease and comorbid depression in the home healthcare setting
Journal of the American Geriatrics Society
Integrated telehealth care for chronic illness and depression in geriatric home care patients: the Integrated Telehealth Education and Activation of Mood (I-TEAM) study.
